div.div:
Adds timeline component to origin story page
Integrates a new Timeline component to enhance storytelling by visualizing the origin timeline.
Improves user engagement and understanding of the content.

Refactors IntroductionImage component layout
Removes timeline component for a cleaner presentation Updates styling and structure to enhance visual appeal Improves accessibility with aria attributes
Relates to design enhancements

Updates import path for testimonial interface
Modifies the import statement to reference the correct location of the Testimonial interface, ensuring proper functionality and maintainability of the codebase.

Refactors import path for generateSlug utility
Updates the import statement for the generateSlug function to use the correct path from "@/lib/utils/format".
This change improves code organization and prevents potential import errors due to incorrect file referencing.

Refactors utility imports for better organization
Moves utility function imports from a generic module to specific format modules.
Improves code clarity and maintainability by grouping related functions together.
No functional changes were introduced.

Adds MasonryGridGallery component and updates images
Implements a new MasonryGridGallery component for better image display.
Updates image sources to enhance content quality and visual appeal.
Includes new image host in configuration for external resources.

Enhances HowWeCanHelpYou page layout and imagery
Implements a new grid layout for displaying testimonials and services.
Replaces existing text with engaging images to improve visual appeal and user engagement.
Updates image sources for consistency and relevance.
Refines styling for better responsiveness across devices.

Updates image source for Our Origin Story page
Replaces the background image to better align with branding.
Enhances visual appeal and user engagement on the page.

Refactors import paths for project and utility modules
Updates import statements for the Project interface and featuredArray utility function to improve module organization.
Enhances clarity by ensuring imports point to accurate file locations.
No functional changes introduced.

Refactors imports and updates layout styles
Reorganizes utility imports to utilize a new format module. Adjusts layout styles for improved responsiveness in various components. Enhances image grid layout for better display on different screen sizes.
No issue reference.

Refactors utility functions and organizes code structure
Removes redundant utility functions from the main file and consolidates them into separate modules for better organization.
Implements new utility functions for parsing lengths and reading times, enhancing maintainability and readability.
Improves code structure by categorizing related functionalities, which aids in future development and testing efforts.

Updates image sources and styles for better UX
Replaces outdated image URLs with new assets for improved relevance and quality.
Modifies CSS classes for enhanced responsiveness and layout consistency across components.
Ensures a more engaging visual presentation in the UI.

Removes unused GridPattern and ImageGridDivider components
Cleans up the codebase by deleting redundant components that are no longer needed, improving maintainability and reducing bundle size.
No associated issue.

Adds tab section component with image galleries
Introduces a new tab section component that displays image galleries for different candidate stages.
Refines tab navigation and enhances mobile responsiveness by implementing a dropdown for tab selection.
Renames existing header component for clarity.
Relates to #456

Adds image galleries with enhanced image sources
Implements two new image gallery components: FeaturedImageGallery and MasonryGridGallery.
Updates allowed image hosts in configuration to include new sources, enhancing content variety.
Removes unused image sources to streamline the configuration.

Adds new logo images and updates logo component
Introduces circular and square logo images for enhanced branding.
Updates the logo component to use the new circular logo.
Improves visual consistency across the application.

Refactors image properties in blog and project interfaces
Updates blog and project interfaces to include `cardImage` property for improved image handling.
Changes import paths for interfaces to enhance organization and clarity.
No functional changes introduced.

Refactors testimonial interface into separate file
Moves the Testimonial interface to a new file for better organization and maintainability.
Updates the Project interface to streamline code structure.

Updates BlogPost interface to require image URLs
Ensures both imageUrl and image2Url are mandatory for blog posts, improving data integrity.
Removes optionality of imageUrl to enforce consistent image handling.

Adds second image URL field to blog posts
Introduces a new field for a second image URL in blog post objects to enhance visual content options.
Updates multiple blog entries to include this new field, improving the flexibility for content presentation.
No associated issues.

Enhances "Let's Work Together" section UI and content
Refines the layout and styling of the project inquiry form Updates text for clarity and adds testimonial integration Removes unnecessary elements for a cleaner design

Enhances blog post display with dynamic components
Introduces a dynamic button for navigating related topics Refactors the blog post layout for improved readability Adds support for displaying additional post content and images
Fixes #123

Adds imageUrl property to blog posts
Introduces imageUrl to enhance blog post structure Facilitates future updates for image integration in posts Ensures consistency across all blog entries
Relates to JIRA-123

Refactors blog post page layout and date formatting
Improves UI structure by reorganizing the blog post header layout for better responsiveness and readability.
Updates date display to utilize a dedicated date conversion function.
Enhances topic badge presentation and overall visual coherence.

Fixes blog date formatting and URL path
Removes unnecessary locale formatting from blog date display.
Updates the button action to navigate to the correct blogs path.
Improves overall clarity and functionality.

Improves date handling in blog sorting utility
Refactors date conversion to use JavaScript Date objects directly, enhancing clarity and performance in sorting blogs by date.
Changes the return type of the date conversion function to a localized string format for better user presentation.
Relates to issue #456
